name: VRange
detailed_description:
VRange is Hot! Blast your way onto the firing range! Pray and Spray across a wide range of environments, taking advantage of a library of fully interactive weapons! Pick your weapon, lock and load your magazines and tear those targets apart! Compete on our Online CQB Leader boards for the top spot as you battle your way through Close Quarter Battle simulation environments.

Shooting Ranges

VRange sports a selection of themed shooting ranges, everything from smashing grandmas china to desert military combat ranges. As we develop VRange, we'll be populating the game with more shooting range environments and game modes. We look forward to working with the community to develop these as they see fit. moving forward.

CQB Courses

VRange ships with two timed CQB courses offering players the ability to compete against the world! As with everything, improvements to CQB game play are a being addressed constantly based on player feedback! We already have several new CQB courses in development coming to the project soon!

Early Access

VRange is an Early Access title, as such, if you choose to adopt the game at this early stage, you're helping to fund the continued development of the game! We're passionate about developing VRange into an as interactive and fun title as we can. We need your support to achieve this goal. We welcome all user feedback, reviews and ideas. Perhaps you've got an idea for a new weapon, a map or a game-mode, we want to hear your plans and your ideas for your game!

Connect with the Devs!

We're developing VRange through the eyes of the players (get it, VR) so we warmly welcome all our players and those interested in the title to get involved with the developers. You can contact the developers directly through the VRange official Discord https://discord.gg/yhJHvfQ


Compete against players from around the globe with VRange leader boards. Strength, skill and aggression all take effect as players battle their way around timed CQB courses. Make your shots count as wasting ammo will lower your score! When the battles through you'll be given the choice to feature your scores through the VRange online leader boards.

short_description: VRange is Hot! Shoot, Boom and Blast your way onto the firing range! Pray and Spray across a wide range of environments, taking advantage of a library of fully interactive weapons! Compete on our Online CQB Leaderboards for the top spot!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection required to upload scores to leaderboards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection required to upload scores to leaderboards.
